name: Block Rush (Fetss)
description:
A small arcade game Inspired by Tetris and other games like it.

How to Play:

- Block will fall from the sky.

- You click the blocks that have already fallen to destroy the in groups

- Don't let the screen get filled up.

Modes:

- Default: blocks fall from up to down.

- Sideway: blocks fall from left to right.

- Dual: blocks fall from both top and bottom to the middle.

- Spindle: blocks fall from 4 sides to the middle.
